html:
i'll plant a rose plant
they'll grow to make people wonder
their smell will be narcotic
their spikes will shed blood
i'll do it under the moon
helping myself with a flashlight
like a serial killer
trying to silently get rid of a corpse
then i will care for the roses
they will be the proudest plant around
and when right day comes
i will take the best branch of all
and i will gift it to someone special
the smell will be narcotic
but i will not get rid of the spikes
they're supposed to shed blood
title: Rose
